Discussion Forums.name: Discussion Forums
Discussion Forums.description: The Discussion Forums Brightspace Data Set returns discussion forums. Results are ordered from newest to oldest.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the discussion forum. Field can be null.

columns.name: MustPostToParticipate
columns.description: Indicates that a user must post in the discussion forum in order to participate in any discussion threads.

columns.name: AllowAnon
columns.description: Indicates whether there is anonymous posting permitted for the discussion forum.

columns.name: IsHidden
columns.description: Indicates whether the discussion forum is hidden.

columns.name: RequiresApproval
columns.description: Indicates that the discussion forum requires approval from a moderator before contributions to the forum are posted.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Display sort order used for the content objects

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the discussion forum is deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeletedDate
columns.description: Date when the discussion forum was deleted (UTC). Field can be null

columns.name: DeletedByUserId
columns.description: User who deleted the discussion forum. Field can be null.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique release condition result identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: First date when learners can post to topics in the forum (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: StartDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: Before the StartDate, this type determines whether learners can view or access discussion topics within the forum. See About Availability type for details. Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Last date when learners can post to topics in the forum (UTC).

columns.name: EndDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: After the EndDate, this type determines whether learners can view or access discussion topics within the forum. See About Availability type for details. Field can be null.
